Text: ...It's so quiet. No after-hours training tonight?

No, not tonight. Wait, I hope it hasn't been
disturbing you...

That's not what I meant. I'd been hearing someone
practicing their swordplay these past few days, so I
was simply curious.

I see. That must have been Number 666. I told her
that rest is also a skill to master, but...

Well, putting in hard work isn't a bad thing. So what
do you think of her?

Well... She stands out from the others in terms of
character and ability. A little more discipline and
she'll make for a useful pawn.

You call her a "pawn", but she certainly seems to
have caught your attention.

That's not how I intended it, but...as her instructor,
I can't help but do so.
Heehee, such a serious answer.

But it's not just her. Each of our recruits has been
assigned duties suited to their personalities and
talents. All of this is thanks to your guidance.

True kindness masked by stern words and actionsâ€”
perhaps this is what draws others to your lead, hm?
That...is only because I lack experience.
I rely on you greatly as you are now.

That's why I want you to do things as you see fit.
If that doesn't get us results, then we can return
to the drawing board.

Lady Alpha, I... Thank you. I shall continue to
perform my duties as instructor to the best of
my ability.

Elsewhere, Number 666 is still dejected after her
training session.
Why did you join the Shadow Garden?

I thought I told you to throw everything away!
So tell me, just what have you rid yourself of?!

We are all here because we have staked everything on
our fight! If you think this is some game, then get out of
my sight, now!
I cast away so much in coming here...

It wasn't supposed to be like this. I didn't come
here in search of frustration...
When, where...how did I go wrong?

...You didn't do anything wrong. You just haven't
cast everything aside yet.
N-Nu...?! When did you...?

I've been here the entire time. Looks like you were
too downcast to notice.

Oh...I see... What do you mean that I haven't cast
everything aside?

I mean your former self, Rose Oriana. It appears that
she's very much still with you.
That's not true! On that day, I became Number 666!
Then why are you so panicked and confused?
Huh...?

If you truly had nothing to compare to your current
reality, you'd never face that kind of doubt.
What?! But...

Possession was like the death of our previous selves.
We were then reborn with new names and a new
purpose. That is the Shadow Garden.

But you're different. You intend to become Rose again
if everything goes as you hope. Am I wrong?
*gasp*

It's that attachment that causes me to see both Rose
and Number 666 in you now.
If you wish to remain here, Number 666...

Then your former self, Rose Oriana, needs to die.
By your own hand.
I must kill my former self...

Memories, both good and bad, the future that lay
ahead for youâ€”the more of Rose you cast aside,
the closer you will become to being a blade of the
Shadow Garden.

That is how everyone here attained strength. We let
go of the past so that we might move ever forward in
battle.

This is a very painful choice, but the rewards are
equally great. Now...which do you choose?
